EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - Consultant Services Email - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Sure thing J From: Melissa Washington [mailto:melissa@smartnetstrategies.com] Sent: Wednesday, August 01, 2012 1:06 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: RE: MBO Partners / Melissa Washington Thanks Sara! From: Sara Conde [mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com] <mailto:[mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com]> Sent: Tuesday, July 31, 2012 8:44 PM To: melissa@smartnetstrategies.com <mailto:melissa@smartnetstrategies.com> Subject: MBO Partners / Melissa Washington Dear Melissa, We had a conversation some time ago regarding our services. As a courtesy I wanted to follow up and get an update from you. We also are now publishing an Independent Consulting Brief. It's a monthly email that provides access to a convenient list of relevant resources, tools and best practices. You can sign up for it by going to http://www.mbopartners.com/independent-consulting-brief <http://www.mbopartners.com/independent-consulting-brief>. Feel free to provide an update by simply replying to this email. Regards, Sara___________________________________Sara CondeConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703-793-6028f: 703.793.6081e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?type=click&enid=bWFpbGluZ2lkPXByb2QtbC0yOTcmbWVzc2FnZWlkPTI5NyZkYXRhYmFzZWlkPTEzMzQ4ODg5NTEmc2VyaWFsPTEyNjQ4OTI2MDImZW1haWxpZD1tZWxpc3NhQHNtYXJ0bmV0c3RyYXRlZ2llcy5jb20mdXNlcmlkPWwtMTI4LTIwMDI2LTExNTQ1MTMtMSZleHRyYT0mJiY=&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRons67JZKXonjHpfsX56ukpXKa1lMI%2F0ER3fOvrPUfGjI4ATsFrI%2FqLAzICFpZo2FFVGO8%3D>
